website_summaries.verdict: A moisturizing oil that can be used by most skin types to improve hydration.
pros: Features cold-pressed superfood seed oils, including blackberry seed oil, blueberry seed oil, and cranberry seed oil
Moisturizes and improves elasticity without clogging pores
Great for those with sensitive or dry skin
cons: Some feel like the smell is too strong or don't like the smell

customer_reviews.title: Works for Drew Barrymore.  Created pimples for me.
customer_reviews.text: Sigh. I first found this product in an article where Drew Barrymore was singing its praises. She has lovely skin for her age and seems a little more au naturel. I do use retinoid products but I figured I’d try a natural blend. Unfortunately for me, it created breakouts and cystic acne. My skin is clear, more on the combination side, but sensitive. I just can’t use straight oils, no matter how purified and of high quality. It may work for others, but unfortunately did not work for me. The scent was mild and did not bother me. The texture was smooth, a hint of tackiness and very organic smelling and feeling. I returned it at Kohl’s.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oil. I think people are using too much product. A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY! This absorbs nicely leaving my skin radient. I love the cold pressed oils and definitely will be purchasing again1
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Sunday Riley for the win
customer_reviews.text: I got this in my fab fit fun box and now I’m addicted. I use at night before moisturizer but after toner and cleansing. It’s definitely thick... but made a difference on my face. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: christina lowe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this serum
customer_reviews.text: I use Juno in conjunction w/ Instanaturals Vitamin c serum and I have seen remarkable results . I have combination skin so It's a little greasy for me , a little does go a long way . I would recommend applying it at least 30 min prior to make-up/ foundation application . However it has made my skin softer and more radiant . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I live in New England and my skin starts to get really dry during the transition from summer to fall, and stays that way until summer again. I can't use thick moisturizers because they make me break out, I have reactive sensitive skin and this oil hasn't caused any problems. It's not too thick, but does an amazing job moisturizing. I will say though, that you can tell that it's on your skin, I don't mind that that much, especially since I rarely wear makeup. If I feel that it's making me a little extra shiny I'll just put some translucent powder over the top to matte it out.
customer_reviews.author: Stayce Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Juno Oil - Unsurpassably Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Juno Oil is incomparable to any other oil on the market The results and benefits are outstanding. A couple of drops go a long way in hydrating your skin leaving it soft. Softens lines and leaves just the'right' glow. My desert island product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jili

customer_reviews.title: Too Oily
customer_reviews.text: Found Juno a little bit too oily. Even when using a little, I felt a residue on my skin. Maybe it’s best for those living in cold climates. I live in a hot, humid climate for 90% of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! starting with the smell I like it a lot, then 3 drops are enough for the face and a little of the neck. after using it I feel that it nourishes my skin, I have hypersensitive skin, rosasea and this calm me, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: maria del mar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Lightly scented and not greasy. Love it at night over serums. Used it on the dry ends of my hair, and loved the outcome. Super soft moisturized locks.
customer_reviews.author: beautymaven

customer_reviews.title: Nice light moisturizing oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice light moisturizing oil. Does not bother my very sensitive skin. Has an odd peppery odor but it is for bedtime use
customer_reviews.author: Westieheaven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my skin look. It’s worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: betsy tucker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE SUNDAY RILEY PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Love this my face is so soft. It calms my redness and evens out my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: My new fav!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been weary of using oil on my face, neck and chest, however this is fantastic! Smells great and easily absorbs into my skin. I do not feel greasy all day, but do have a glow. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sunday Riley day oil
customer_reviews.text: My every day oil. Mix a little with my foundation. Sunday Riley collection has does wonders for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Oily finish with none of the benefits
customer_reviews.text: This product is very greasy with none of the benefits. I can tolerate a bit of a greasy feel if the product is deeply moisturizing. Unfortunately this does not quench the skin. The scent is herbal/medicinal not floral or fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any type of skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer. I had always been afraid of using face oil products but I am so glad I started using this. I have combo skin and break out but have not had any breakouts. Been using the product for about 4 months now. My skin feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: wmellis05

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. On my 3rd bottle. Pricey but works with no greasy feel or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: No seal on bottle, and some of the oil had leaked out...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive oil, and for there to be no seal on the bottle is terrible packaging. Some of the oil leaked out! Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sheri bartel

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed properly
customer_reviews.text: Mine wasn’t sealed properly and soaked through the box. A good portion of the product was wasted. It seemed to have been opened before. I’m actually unsure if I should even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend using it at night since hit feels oily on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Riley Juno oil for several years and despite the price keep purchasing the product year after year. It nourishes the skin and leaves it glowing. it lasts for awhile because I don't need much- just 4-5 drops. I recommend using it at night since hit feels oily on the skin and maybe too heavy to wear under the makeup. The smell is very natural, some find it unpleasant but I am ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: oksana walton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This oil is awesome! I mix a few drops with my moisturizer day and night - I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri R.

customer_reviews.title: I am so much disappointed not what it says it does at all
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this oil based on the price. I am so much disappointed not what it says it does at all. It's a bit heavy and smells bad. Also I have been using it more than a week and saw no results so far. Well I definitely paid a high price to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy J. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I think some are using this incorrectly...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product, but a little goes a long way. Please don't slather your face in this oil and expect it to absorb immediately because it won't! A few drops, some massaging, and a little time is all you need. I use this at night on top of my retinol (after waiting 10 minutes) and it has been great! I would use this 20 minutes or so before bedtime. You won't see results in a week...unfortunately skincare takes about 6 weeks to see true results. If you are looking for more immediate results, you should probably use a hyaluronic acid as this pulls water into the skin. This product is great for more long term effects.
customer_reviews.author: Ellemarie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is not worth the hybe!! so ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is not worth the hybe!! so expensive and did nothing but making my face darker even darker than my body skin tone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Najla Ramadan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite for my skin! I do buy from Sunday Riley directly! Fresh products. New points for purchase program and always send samples!!
customer_reviews.author: lynda kosnik

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye dehydration
customer_reviews.text: This oil is fine and fast absorbing- after a good cleanse my combination (often dehydrated) skin just drinks it up. It really shines when I go on airplanes or to higher altitudes or desert environs- my skin doesn’t dry out and stays as supple, like after a facial. Love this oil, it’s the best I’ve tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Beet Hoven

customer_reviews.title: This is the best serum. I use every morning under my makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is the best serum. I use every morning under my makeup. My skin is smoother and visibly more radiant. Also has some protection from sun.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: very little scent and no dyes
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Herbivore lapis but tried Juno in the store and liked how it nourished my dry mature face and hands without feeling super greasy
customer_reviews.author: krispy_enterprises

product_meta.title: Sunday Riley JUNO Face Oil, 0.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Juno Essential Face Oil. Natural beauty products are made up of both natural and synthetic ingredients and are paraben, phthalate and sulfate-free.

BRAND STORY
Sunday Riley uses only cutting-edge technology and the highest quality ingredients, for instant, noticeable results, without compromise. Welcome to the world of Sunday Riley – clean formulas, for results you can feel good about.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
